noun.description: A chain or garland of flowers, leaves, or ribbons, hung in a curve as a decoration.

verb.description: Adorn (a place) with ribbons, garlands, or other decorations.
examples: the room was festooned with balloons and streamers

origin: Mid 17th century: from French feston, from Italian festone festal ornament, from festum, (plural) festa feast.
